definition: pipal tree (Ficus religiosa)/bo fig tree/Bodhi tree (sacred to Buddhism and Hinduism)
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The Bodhi tree, under which Buddha attained  enlightenment, was a banyan by another name.
sentences.chinese: 佛是在菩提樹下悟道的，菩提又名榕樹。

sentences.english: Where now we gather in linden's shadow at eventide.
sentences.chinese: 黃昏時刻，我們在菩提樹下召集。

sentences.english: Under the Linden Tree, Buddha sat up in the middle and appeared calm.
sentences.chinese: 在菩提樹下，佛祖端坐中間，神態安詳。

sentences.english: Upscale shops once again line the famous avenue Unter den Linden.
sentences.chinese: 高檔商店再次在著名的菩提樹下大道開張。

sentences.english: So Linden Lab lost money in the real world.
sentences.chinese: 所以菩提樹貨幣在現實中損失了金錢。

sentences.english: Daniel, this banyan is the very divine tree.

sentences.english: At the age of thirty, the Buddha sat under the Bodhi Tree and attained Proper Enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 釋迦牟尼佛在三十歲時，於菩提樹下證得正覺。

sentences.english: That is where Siddhartha sat in meditation under a tree called the “Bodhi tree”.
sentences.chinese: 那是悉達多在一棵菩提樹下靜坐的地方。

sentences.english: On the appointed day, in the small hours of the morning, a fire was lighted in the Panchavati.
sentences.chinese: 在一個指定日子的凌晨，火在菩提樹下燃燒着。
您可以看到一棵200年的菩提樹。

sentences.english: There are lots of banyan trees in Xishuang Banna.
sentences.chinese: 西雙版納的菩提樹多的是。

sentences.english: A 132 year-old banyan tree in Lahaina, Hawaii stands in Banyan Tree Park.

sentences.english: God foothills of the two tree, the legend of the Southern Song Xianchun for years by planting.

sentences.english: Lindens, silently you make his own desire.
sentences.chinese: 菩提樹下，默默的爲你許下自己的心願。

sentences.english: Heart, already sit under the bodhi tree, a lotus, be calm and empty.
sentences.chinese: 心，已經坐在菩提樹下，一羽蓮花，傳誦淡定的空寂。

definition: pattra palm tree (Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras
